properties.question: What is a characteristic feature of the presented squamous cell carcinoma in the provided photograph?
properties.option_a: A uniform, smooth, and flat surface with no signs of inflammation
properties.option_b: An irregular, ulcerative-vegetative tumour with crusts and inflammatory margins
properties.option_c: A well-circumscribed, small, and non-ulcerative lesion
properties.option_d: A large, cystic lesion with clear fluid and no surface irregularities
